snippet: The rejection at a major international conference  highlighted the difficulties of reaching a global consensus on protecting many kinds of endangered wildlife.
abstract: Proposal to ban international trade in polar bear parts is rejected at Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species in Bangkok, highlighting difficulties of reaching global consensus on protecting many kinds of endangered wildlife.
lead_paragraph: The rejection at a major international conference  highlighted the difficulties of reaching a global consensus on protecting many kinds of endangered wildlife.

headline.seo: Plan to Ban Trade in Polar Bear Parts Is Rejected
headline.main: Proposal to Ban Trade in Polar Bear Parts Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: Proposals to Protect Polar Bears Fail
